# [Interview #83: Barnes and Noble Chat, Entry #40](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=83#40)

#### Moderator

Thank you for joining us tonight, Robert Jordan. Before you go do you have any last words for your online audience?

#### Robert Jordan

Thank you guys for coming. I'm sorry I couldn't get to everyone's question, but there were a lot of questionsâ€”a lot! Thanks again, I enjoyed it, guys.
